title: Updating apps removes pinned tiles
body: Hello. When updating apps from the play store, they sometimes disappear from the home screen if they are pinned to home.
author: samerc

comments.body: fixed this in 0.5.0 please let me know if it still occurs thanks!

Looks solved. Thanks.
If the issue arises again once more updates are available, i will let you know

satisfaction_conditions: Prevents pinned home screen tiles from being removed during app updates
Solution persists across multiple app update cycles
Does not require manual re-pinning after updates
